entry.title: addr/getaddr behaviour
entry.summary: The context refers to a query about the specification and coding of nodes in a protocol. The user is specifically interested in finding information about how nodes will periodically heartbeat their own external address, as mentioned in the protocol documentation. The user also asks whether nodes repropagate these messages and how they distinguish them from other address messages. Additionally, the user seeks guidance on where to find the code that sends and receives address messages.
